subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Crisp homered in the top of the first, then hit a thunderous three-run home run off Rafael Soriano in the 10th inning to lead the Oakland Athletics to a stunning victory at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: Crisp homered in the top of the first, then hit a thunderous three-run home run off Rafael Soriano in the 10th inning to lead the Oakland Athletics to a stunning victory at Yankee Stadium.
